.. py:module:: src.speciesrule


Module Contents
---------------


.. function:: parts_eval(i, parts)

   Naming function for species


   :Parameters:

       **i: int**
           variable, count of species

       **parts: list**
           different parts in string

   :Returns:

       str
           current name













   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!


.. function:: json_to_species(filename)

   Constructs a new SpeciesRule from a json file


   :Parameters:

       **filename: str**
           input filename

   :Returns:

       SpeciesRule
           species













   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!


.. py:class:: SpeciesRule(name, category, mz, count=1, count_per_mol=1, begin=None, end_mz=None, family_number=None, naming_fn=None, adduct_fn=None)

   Class to model the rule of a species
   Used to generate several species repeated a given
   number of times
















   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!

   .. method:: species(self)

      Extracts all  species from this rule
      Creates a dictionary:
      key=name, value=m/z ratio



      :Returns:

          dict
              dictionary mapping species to m/z ratio













      ..
          !! processed by numpydoc !!
